1.text: Are you a student at University of Namur ?

2.text: To which wireless network do you want to connect ?

3.text:
On which operating system is running the device you want to connect ?
To be able to connect to this wireless network, you have to run on one of these operating systems : Android 6, Windows 8 or Mac OS 10.12 or later

answers.text: I have an obsolete operating system.

4.text:
Connecting to Eduroam.
Your username is the e-mail adress you use to connect to your university's platform. Your password is the one you use to connect to your university's platform

5.text: <contact>You can contact us</contact>, we will try to help you

6.text: Settings of the wireless network parameters

7.text:
Connecting to UNamur.
Your username is your eID followed by "@unamur.be" (For instance: adupont@unamur.be). Your password is the one ou use to connect to UNamur's platform.
If the system asks you to verify a certificate, make sure the server adress is "clearpass.unamur.be" and validate.

8.text: You should now be connected ! If we have helped you, you can follow us on social medias
